issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add DictionaryArray support for create_batch_empty
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11327](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11327). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
the create_batch_empty function is used for creating output during aggregation. As part of my plan for better dictionary support it also needs to support DictionaryArray as well.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11327?focusedCommentId=17332351) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/154
